publ: by Aircraft Owners and Pilots Association
name: PilotBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Get your top five general aviation news updates each week in under five minutes! Brought to you by the Aircraft Owners and Pilots Association!

You can just say "Alexa, play Pilot Briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
